required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Polymorphids an mRNA Expression in Obese Genes
clinical_study.official_title: Polymorphids and mRNA Expression in Genes, Significant for Developing Obesity and Typ II Diabetes in Different Types/Localisations of Fat Tissue

brief_summary.textblock:
Fat tissue from omenta, thigh and abdomen taken under anesthesia on subjects undergoing laparoscopic surgery, cholecystectomy, reflux surgery or gastric by-pass (GBP).
Are there any difference in polymorphids and/or mRNA expression in genes significant for developing obesity, between normal weight and obese individuals, with or without diabetes typ 2 .
Are there any difference in polymorphids and/or mRNA expression in different types of fat tissue

primary_outcome.measure: Differences in polymorphids and/or mRNA expression in genes, significant for developing obesity and type 2 diabetes, between patients with normal weight and obesity
primary_outcome.time_frame: approximatly 30 minutes after start of operation
primary_outcome.description: fat biopsy taken from abdomen, omenta and thigh at surgery

primary_outcome.measure: Difference in polymorphids and/or mRNA expression in different types of fat tissue in patients with normal weight or obesity with or without diabetes type 2
primary_outcome.time_frame: approximatly 30 minutes after start of operation
primary_outcome.description: fat biopsy; abdomen, omenta and thigh taken at surgery

arm_group.description: Patients with type 2 diabetes and body mass index 35 or more.
Patients undergoing surgery, gastric bypass or cholecystectomy, without diabetes type 2 and body mass index 35 or more
Patients undergoing surgery, cholecystectomy or reflux, without type 2 diabetes and body mass index between 18-27

biospec_descr.textblock: biopsys; Fat from oment, thigh and abdomen

study_pop.textblock: Tree groups; group I: diabetes type II with BMI>35 Group II: no diabetes BMI>35 Group III: no diabetes BMI 18-27

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- age 18 years or older
- laparoscopic surgery (Gastric by-pass, cholecystectomy, antireflux surgery)
- Normal weight without type 2 diabetes BMI 18-25
- Obese without type 2 diabetes BMI>35
- Obese with type 2 diabetes BMI>35
Exclusion Criteria:
- under 18 years
- open surgery
- pregnancy
- BMI >27-<35
